English: Welcome to the Red Army
Go to the officer.
Execute the American prisoners.
Escape from the island!
We'll be right there, comrade Tarasenko.\nNow you will prove your loyalty to the great Soviet empire.
Czech: Za chvíli budeme na místě, soudruhu Těreščenko.\nNyní prokážete svou věrnost velké Sovětské říši.

English: What's going on? And where are we going?
One might call it the Prison island, serving for our purposes.\nThere you're be testing your loyalty, comrade Tarasenko.
Czech: Jak jsem řekl, test vaší věrnosti, soudruhu Těreščenko.

English: Look and learn, comrade Tarasenko.
Ahh... Jean. Long time no see, how are you?
Go fuck yourself, fucker.
Hugo, I said shut up!
Yes, boy, keep your mouth shut and listen to your commander.\nHow did it sound, Jean? Long live the Resistance!
You betrayed us, goddammit!\nYou can kill me, Greg, but from this moment everyone will know, that it was the People of Everon,\nwho fought against the super powers.
It was the people of Everon, who didn't give up and was figting for his interests and his freedom!
I'm quite sure, we will not kill you, Jean. Instead you'll help us with a shovel in your hands.
You have no idea, what the folk of Everon can do!\nYou're wearing this fucking uniform and thinking I'll knee before you? You dammed Soviet dog?
NO! You asshole! He was 17! He was only fucking 17!
He should shut his fucking mouth up.\nCome on. We're leaving and you go with us, Jean.
Fuck you Lemontov! I'll kill you! Understand? I'll fuck kill you!
Come on, comrade Tarasenko. Your test beggins.
What's this?
These are enemies of blood, comrade Tarasenko.\nThis war has begann by the American's dogs and with their blood it's also going to over\nand you'll take care of it right now, comrade.
Czech: Toto, soudruhu Tereščenko jsou nepřátelé naší krve.\nTato válka začala krví Amerických psů a jejich krví také skončí a o to se postaráte právě vy, soudruhu.

English: I want you to execute them all without mercy, comrade Tarasenko.
Czech: Chci po vás, abyste je všechny bez milosti popravil, soudruhu Těreščenko.

English: Don't do it, please! I have children and wife! I have nothing done!
Czech: Prosím, ne! Mám ženu a dítě! Nic jsem neudělal!

English: Good work, comrade.
Do not ask anything and follow me.\nLet's get out of this fucking island.
Czech: Na nic se neptejte a pojďte se mnou.\nVypadneme z tohohle zkurvenýho ostrova!

English: FOLLOW
